resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103882</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103882</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202591</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Fire In Pythagorville: Problem-Centered Lessons</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Feuer In Pythagorville: Problem-Zentrierte 
Lektionen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Feu Dans Pythagorville : Leçons 
Problème-Centrées</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fogo Em Pythagorville: Lições 
Problema-Centradas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fuoco In Pythagorville: Lezioni 
Problema-Centrate</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πυρκαγιά σε Pythagorville: 
Πρόβλημα-κεντροθετημένος μαθήματα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fuego En Pythagorville: Lecciones 
Problema-Centradas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will work on problem-centered lessons which use the application of the Pythagorean theorem to put out a fire in the fictional town of Pythagorville.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mathematics and Statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer arbeiten auf Problem-zentrierten 
Lektionen, die die Anwendung des pythagoräischen Theorems verwenden, 
um ein Feuer in die fiktive Stadt von Pythagorville heraus 
einzusetzen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants travailleront aux leçons 
problème-centrées qui emploient l'application du théorème 
pythagorien pour eteindre un feu dans la ville fictive de 
Pythagorville.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes trabalharão nas lições 
problema-centradas que usam a aplicação do theorem pythagorean pôr 
para fora um fogo na cidade fictional de Pythagorville.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi lavoreranno alle lezioni 
problema-centrate che usano l'applicazione del teorema pythagorean per
mettere fuori un fuoco nella città fictional di Pythagorville.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα εργαστούν στα πρόβλημα-κεντροθετημένα
μαθήματα που χρησιμοποιούν την εφαρμογή του πυθαγορικού 
θεωρήματος για να σβηστεί μια πυρκαγιά στην πλασματική πόλη 
Pythagorville.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes trabajarán en las lecciones 
problema-centradas que utilizan la aplicación del teorema pythagorean
para poner hacia fuera un fuego en la ciudad ficticia de 
Pythagorville.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathematik und Statistiken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mathématiques et statistiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Matemática e statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Matematica e statistiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαθηματικά και στατιστικές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Matemáticas y estadística</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:KELLY CRISP
FN:KELLY CRISP
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202591</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103882</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/fire-in-pythagorville-problem-centered-lessons</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
